lld - The LLVM Linker

lld is LLVM's linker.

Source

lld is available in the LLVM SVN repository: svn co http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/lnt/trunk.

lld is also available via the read-only git mirror: git clone http://llvm.org/git/lld.git.
